cells.data:
I am basically just re-running only D. bockii from PCR CM007 and PCR CM008.  `Dbir_ES2_R2_cm`. The D. bockii bands were not crisp so we are now increasing the annealing temperature to hopefully get crisper lines.

## Samples

Primers: `Dboc_ES2_F1_cm` and `Dbir_ES2_R2_cm`
1.)  D. bocki
2.)  D. bocki
3.)  D. bocki
4.)  D. bocki
5.)  D. bocki

## Program

| step | temp       |  time  |
|------|------------|--------|
| 1    | 95         | 30 sec |
| 2    | 95         | 15 sec |
| 3    | 66         | 1 min  |
| 4    | 72         | 2 min  |
| 5    | 72         | 1 min  |
| 6    | 4          | hold   |
